009package imagingbook.common.color.iterate;
010
011import java.awt.Color;
012import java.util.Random;
013
014import imagingbook.common.color.sets.ColorEnumeration;
015
016public class FiniteRandomColorSequencer extends FiniteLinearColorSequencer {
017        
018        private final Random rg = new Random();
019
020        public FiniteRandomColorSequencer(Color... colors) {
021                super(colors);
022        }
023        
024        public FiniteRandomColorSequencer(Class<? extends ColorEnumeration> clazz) {
025                super(clazz);
026        }
027        
028        /**
029         * Sets the seed of the internal {@link Random} instance, which
030         * affects successive calls to {@link #next()} only.
031         * 
032         * @param seed the new seed value
033         * @see Random#setSeed(long)
034         */
035        public void setRandomSeed(long seed) {
036                rg.setSeed(seed);
037        }
038        
039        @Override
040        public Color next() {
041                int step = rg.nextInt(Math.max(1, colorArray.length - 1)); // works for a single color too
042                next = (next + 1 + step) % colorArray.length;
043                return colorArray[next];
044        }
045        
046        
047}
